question: I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.
description: Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.
values: Allowed values: yes (stored as 'yes'; original raw label: 'Yes').

question: How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?
description: Frequency of using AI-powered or digital tools in daily life.
values: Allowed values (stored as snake_case): never, rarely, sometimes, occasionally, often, very_often, everyday.

question: On average, how many hours do you spend online each day? (self-estimate)
description: Estimated number of hours spent online per day.
values: Allowed values (stored as snake_case categories): lt_2_hours, 2_4_hours, 5_6_hours, 7_8_hours, 9_10_hours, 11_12_hours, gt_12_hours.

question: I often use AI tools to help me make decisions, even for everyday choices.
description: Frequency of using AI tools to assist with everyday decision-making.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I feel more confident in my decisions when an AI tool supports my thinking.
description: Confidence in decisions when supported by AI tools.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I tend to rely on AI tools when making decisions feels difficult.
description: Tendency to rely on AI tools when decision-making feels difficult.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I prefer to check my ideas with AI before finalising an important decision.
description: Preference for checking ideas with AI before finalising important decisions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: AI can be helpful for giving me clarity when I'm unsure what choice to make.
description: Perceived value of AI tools for providing clarity when uncertain about choices.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I've started second-guessing my own judgement more than I used to.
description: Extent to which AI use is associated with increased second-guessing of one’s own judgement.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: If AI gives a different answer to mine, I sometimes wonder whether I might be mistaken.
description: Degree of doubt in personal judgement when AI-generated answers differ.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I use AI tools to check whether my thinking is on the right track.
description: Use of AI tools to validate or check personal thinking.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I tend to pause before acting so I can check what an AI tool suggests.
description: Tendency to pause actions in order to consult AI suggestions first.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: For important decisions, I feel more comfortable checking an AI tool as part of my process.
description: Comfort with including AI tools as part of the process for important decisions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: Using AI regularly has changed the way I feel about making decisions on my own.
description: Perceived change in feelings about independent decision-making due to AI use.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I think about how much AI might be influencing my decisions.
description: Frequency of reflecting on the extent of AI influence on decisions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I feel that AI suggestions can be persuasive, even when I try to rely on my own intuition.
description: Perceived persuasiveness of AI suggestions relative to personal intuition.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I need to take a moment to separate my own judgement from AI suggestions.
description: Need to consciously separate personal judgement from AI-generated suggestions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: Even when AI is helpful, I'm aware that relying on it too much may not be ideal for me long-term.
description: Awareness of potential long-term downsides of over-relying on AI tools.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I feel more independent when I make decisions without using AI.
description: Perceived independence when making decisions without AI support.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: AI tools influence how I think about my decisions.
description: Perceived influence of AI tools on how decisions are thought about or framed.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I occasionally reflect on whether AI is shaping my decision-making style.
description: Frequency of reflecting on whether AI is shaping one’s decision-making style.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I feel conflicted about how much influence AI has on me.
description: Level of inner conflict about the degree of AI influence on oneself.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I generally trust my own judgement, but AI tools can sometimes affect how strongly I feel about a choice.
description: Extent to which AI tools affect strength of conviction in personal decisions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: Describe a recent moment where you relied on an AI tool to help you make a decision — big or small. What made you turn to AI instead of deciding on your own?
description: Open-ended description of a recent decision where an AI tool was used and reasons for choosing AI support.
values: Open-text responses describing a recent situation where participants used an AI tool to assist with a decision and their reasons for doing so. Minimal cleaning applied (whitespace trimming, newline removal). Raw wording preserved exactly. Empty string indicates no response.

question: How much do you trust AI systems to act in your best interests?
description: Level of trust in AI acting in users best interests.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not at all ; 7 = Completely

question: How clear do you feel about what matters most in your life right now?
description: Self-rated clarity about personal values and priorities.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not clear at all ; 7 = Extremely clear

question: How much does modern digital life affect your ability to focus, decide, or think clearly?
description: Impact of digital life on cognitive clarity.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not at all ; 7 = Very strongly

question: How do you feel about the growing role of AI in everyday decision-making?
description: Emotional evaluation of AI's role in everyday decisions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very negative ; 7 = Very positive

question: Which values do you believe AI systems should reflect? (select upto 3)
description: Values participants believe AI systems should reflect (multi-select).
values: Multi-select; stored as semicolon-separated snake_case tokens: honesty, empathy, fairness, respect, responsibility, human_wellbeing, non_harm, transparency, accountability.

question: What is your age group?
description: Participant age group.

question: Which of the following best describes your gender?
description: Participant gender identity.
values: Allowed values: man, woman, non_binary, prefer_not_to_say.

question: Country of residence.
description: Participant country of residence.
values: Allowed values (ISO-like codes): au, ca, ie, nz, uk, us.

question: What is your highest level of education?
description: Highest level of education completed.
values: Allowed values: less_than_high_school, high_school, some_university_college, bachelors_degree, postgraduate_degree, other.

question: Which of the following best describes your current work status?
description: Participant employment or occupational status.
values: Allowed values: student, employed_full_time, employed_part_time, self_employed, not_currently_working, other.

question: How would you describe your general emotional wellbeing?
description: Self-rated emotional wellbeing.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very poor ; 7 = Excellent
